name: Weekly Planner Template (Notion)
description: I know how hard it is to do everything in one day. One month can seem to be a little too far if you want your target to be achieved in a very short period of time. I created this minimalist Notion template that will help you get your work done in a week! Plan your weekly schedule in this minimalist yet powerful Notion template!Plan your weekly schedule using this minimalist planner. It's one page and you can see everything in one glance.FAQsWho am I?
